about_the_game:
Queen of Seas 2- Wallpapers
10 Pixelated HD wallpapers from the game Queen of Seas 2

Wallpapers included:

1 - Boat (PNG Full HD 1920x1080)
2 - Fishermen's Village (PNG WHD 3000x1080)
3 - Home Sweet Home (PNG Full HD 1920x1080)
4 - Lighthouse Basement (PNG Full HD 1920x1080)
5 - Lighthouse Upper Deck (PNG Full HD 1920x1080)
6 - Lighthouse (PNG Full HD 1920x1080)
7 - Village Overview (PNG Full HD 1920x1080)
8 - Pier (PNG Full HD 1920x1080)
9 - Pinnacle (PNG Full HD 1920x1080)
10 - Queen of Seas (PNGFull HD 1920x1080)

Each wallpaper have two files, with and without game logo
Total files: 20

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Pentium or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or equivalent
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon or equivalent
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
